    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shared Stratagem](/Feats.aspx?ID=5944) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 107 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself. When you hit a creature with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to [Devising a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=2813), designate one ally. The creature you hit is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to that ally on the next attack that ally makes against that creature before the start of your next turn.

<title level="2">Shared Stratagem leads to...</title>
[Didactic Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=5970)
name: Shared Stratagem
